name: Off-Road Police Car Driver Chase: Real Driving & Action Shooting Game
name_original: Off-Road Police Car Driver Chase: Real Driving & Action Shooting Game
description:
Drive police cars to engage in hot pursuit & eliminate grand gangsters trying to outrun cops. Play Offroad Police Car Driver game to fight heinous scum in sin city.

Show off your crazy police car driving skills while chasing thugs & robbers on risky offroad terrain. Underworld criminals have destroyed peace of city. Your responsibility as city police officer is to ensure law enforcement and demolition of remorseless criminals. Take every possible action to stop reckless terrorists and become the legendary hero cop. Police car is armed with missiles and guns to shoot escaping outlaws. Shoot down all enemy cars but beware of counter terrorist attacks as they have got missiles launcher too. Get ready for thrilling cops vs criminals action. Smash rival cars in missile attack & insane shooting. Turn on police car siren while patrolling through City Street. Catch all the ruthless bandits who don't obey civil laws in massive open world environment. Bring justice in your hometown.


Game Features:
10 action packed police chase missions
Armored vehicles mounted with missiles and guns
Realistic city and treacherous offroad tracks
Auto physics controls for smooth driving and shooting
Enthralling 3D graphics with quality sounds

Kindly give us your feedback in the reviews section so that we may improve our games in future releases.
